comment: Very good professor, one of the best in the German department. Her explanations are very clear, the tests are easy. You must have the book and work on the online assignments. I highly recommend her if you really want to learn German.
Awesome professor. Funny too. Hard work like any language, but she is very helpful. Loved this class.

Prof Dell is wonderful! German is a tricky language and she expects a lot of effort from her students, but is more than fair and always happy to help and explain things if you get confused. I would recommend her to anyone taking German!

Awesome professor from Germany. Expects you to work hard, but doesn't have unrealistic expectations. I would highly recommend taking her if you really want to learn German. She is challenging, but very willing to help you until you get it. Brings food to the roleplays and had a lot of insight into German culture.
